channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The federal government is still shut down. Here's what that means across the country
item.description: The federal government remains shut down, in what is now the longest shutdown in U.S. history. Reporters from the NPR Network are digging into the way...

item.title: Bird flu surges among poultry amid a scaled back federal response
item.description: Migrating wild birds are spreading the virus to domesticated flocks, increasing the risk of eventually seeing a human outbreak. Scientists are trouble...

item.title: The government shutdown is delaying an assistance program families use to heat homes
item.description: The Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program, or LIHEAP, helps about 6 million U.S. households pay energy bills, buy fuel, or fix broken heaters. The...

item.title: ICE is sending a chill through the construction industry
item.description: The construction industry, where more than a quarter of workers are foreign-born, has long struggled to find enough workers. Now, industry officials s...

item.title: The DOJ has been firing judges with immigrant defense backgrounds
item.description: NPR's data analysis shows that the DOJ has tended to fire judges with immigrant defense backgrounds in its recent rounds of dismissals.

item.title: Google Maps upgrades navigation in India with Gemini, safety alerts
item.description: India becomes the second market after the U.S. to get Gemini-powered navigation on Google Maps.

item.title: Discord’s Family Center update now lets parents monitor weekly purchases

item.title: Perplexity to pay Snap $400M to power search in Snapchat
item.description: Snap said today that it has signed a deal with AI-powered search engine Perplexity to power a new chatbot. As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Sn...

item.title: FAA says it will list airports where it is reducing flights during the government shutdown
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is expected to list where it plans to scale back flights by 10% starting Friday. The agency says it will release d...

item.title: Officials scour charred site of Kentucky UPS plane crash for victims and answers
The remains and stories of Native American students are being reclaimed from a Pennsylvania cemetery
Anker-backed hybrid RV startup Evotrex comes out of stealth
item.description: Evotrex joins startups like Lightship, Pebble, and Grounded in trying to disrupt the RV market, which is skewing younger.

item.title: Ventures Platform, one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors, has raised another $64 million
item.description: The Lagos-based firm and one of Africa’s most active early-stage investors is targeting a final close of $75 million for its second fund.
